botMessages.message: Hi, I’m BoatBot 🚤🤖, a digital boating assistant. 👋
Would you like me to connect you to an agent who can assist further?
Your inquiry has been captured, someone will be reaching out to you shortly. Thanks for taking the time to chat!
Sorry, I’m still learning. I’m afraid I didn’t understand that, can you please try again?
Unfortunately, there are no agents available at the moment. Please try again at a later time.
Please select from the following options so that I may direct you to the right department.
Unfortunately all of our agents are currently unavailable.
I am connecting you with an agent now!
Unfortunately all of our agents are currently unavailable.
I am connecting you with an agent now!
Would you like to leave us a message? An agent will get back to you as soon as possible.
Alrighty then! Don't hesitate to get in touch. Have a great day 🤗
May I please confirm your first name?
May I please confirm your last name?
What is the best email address we can reach you at?
Which of the following is your preferred service location?
What are you inquiring about today? 😁
Would you like to leave us a message? An agent will get back to you as soon as possible.
Thanks for contacting us! Have a great day 😊
May I please confirm your first name?
May I please confirm your last name?
What is the best email address we can reach you at?
What is your phone number?
What is your Postal Code?
What are you inquiring about today? 😁
Sorry, I was unable to locate your order 😕. Let me connect you with a Service Advisor.
Allow me a moment while I look for your appointment.
Sorry, I was unable to locate your order 😕. Let me connect you with a Service Advisor.
Please select the Service Appointment you are inquiring about:
Sorry, I was unable to locate your order 😕. Let me connect you with a Service Advisor.
{!Stage}
Is there anything else I can help you with today? 😁
Sounds good, I'll redirect you to the main menu now. 👍
Thanks for chatting, see you on the water! 🌊
